data: MASA Li et al. (2024e)
Multi-agent framework, with specialized risk and portfolio agents
Using portfolio as the incentive mechanism, to increase the diversity of strategies
Particularly outstanding risk-adjusted portfolio, in CSI300, DJIA, S&P500
FreQuant Jeon et al. (2024)
Frequency domain analysis, used to identify patterns
Through DFT for multi-granularity asset representation
ARR: increased 2.1Ã—, Enhanced stability during market transitions
EarnMore Zhang et al. (2024d)
Investable portfolio, with transferable credentials
Self-supervised credentialing and reconstruction
Return: +40%, Risk level similar
TrendTrader Ding et al. (2024b)
Multi-modal fusion of price and news
Continuous reinforcement learning (RL) framework
ARR, ASR, MDD showed outstanding performance in DJIA, SSE-50
Network-EDM Hui and Wang (2024)
Using network theory for extreme risk monitoring
Using large independent sets for diversification
During market downturns, showed particularly outstanding performance in CSI 300
Market-Graph Yamagata and Ono (2024)
Based on the organization of market graphs, used to track indices
Using primal-dual decomposition for trading volume sparsity normalization
In S&P500 and other indices, has a higher Sharpe ratio
LLM-Alpha Kou et al. (2024)
Based on LLM alpha factors mining
Multi-agent system, with dynamic control switches
Portfolio: +53.17% compared to market -11.73% (China, 2023)
